modShortDescription: A few folks said they wanted the NVG effect from DF in vanilla, so it's more red than full green. This mod will do that.
modDescription:
A few folks said they wanted the NVG effect from [DF](https://7daystodiemods.com/darkness-falls-mod/) in vanilla, so it’s more red than full green. This mod will do that.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsXML/tree/main/KHA20-NVGChange)**

If you appreciate KhaineGB’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/khainegb).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25751-khaines-a20-modlets-bigger-backpacks-lockable-slots-behemoths-random-wandering-hordes-etc/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
